overview: Second solo project by korean singer (SHINee) and soloist Kim Kibum (KEY).  He said  “I finally became ‘me’. I have a chance to show the audience that this is me. This album is the album-version of Key.” about Bad Love, "it’s inspired by retro themes! Of course, it looks like a horror-themed fashion show in space!" he adds.
title: KEY 'BAD LOVE' MV
